name: Greek salad
discr: A Greek salad, also known as horiatiki salad, is a traditional Greek salad made with fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, olives, and feta cheese. It is typically seasoned with salt, pepper, and oregano, and dressed with olive oil.

name: Bruscuetta
discr: Bruschetta is an Italian appetizer consisting of grilled bread topped with a variety of ingredients, such as tomatoes, basil, garlic, olive oil, and cheese. It is a simple dish to make, but it is full of flavor.

name: Desert
discr: A lemon dessert is a sweet dish that typically features lemon as a primary ingredient. Lemon desserts can be made in a variety of ways, but they often have a tart and tangy flavor.
